type1-project-1.name: White Buddha Statue
type1-project-1.description:
Carved from a single block of White Thassos marble, this Buddha statue stands as an expression of stillness and light.

The stone was chosen not for brilliance alone, but for its quiet glow — a surface that absorbs and reflects daylight with a calm, jade-like warmth. In its seated posture, every proportion is attentive: shoulders relaxed, hands gently resting, presence undisturbed.

At the Vipassana Meditation Center, the statue inhabits a quiet space above the hall. Here, it does not command the room — it opens it.

type1-project-2.name: Golden Guardian
type1-project-2.description:
A majestic guardian lion carved from premium granite, symbolizing protection and strength.

Every detail from the flowing mane to the powerful stance has been meticulously crafted by our master artisans, creating a piece that commands attention while maintaining an elegant presence.

type1-project-3.name: Serenity Garden
type1-project-3.description:
A harmonious sculpture designed for contemplative spaces, blending traditional Buddhist aesthetics with contemporary minimalism.

The piece invites stillness and reflection, becoming a focal point for meditation gardens worldwide.

type1-project-4.name: Temple Relief
type1-project-4.description:
An intricate relief panel depicting traditional Buddhist narratives, designed for temple interiors.

Each figure and symbol has been carefully researched and rendered to honor the spiritual traditions they represent.

type2-project-1.name: Modern Buddha
type2-project-1.description:
A modern interpretation of the classic Buddha figure, featuring clean lines and geometric forms.

This piece bridges ancient spirituality with contemporary design sensibilities, perfect for modern architectural spaces.

type2-project-2.name: Lotus Fountain
type2-project-2.description:
A stunning water feature centered around a blooming lotus carved from white marble.

The interplay of water and stone creates a mesmerizing focal point, symbolizing purity and enlightenment.

type2-project-3.name: Garden Buddha
type2-project-3.description:
A serene Buddha sculpture designed specifically for outdoor garden settings.

Weather-resistant finishing ensures this piece maintains its beauty through all seasons.

type2-project-4.name: Wisdom Figure
type2-project-4.description:
A contemplative figure representing the pursuit of wisdom and inner peace.

The graceful pose and serene expression invite meditation and reflection.

type3-project-1.name: Heritage Collection
type3-project-1.description:
A collection of sculptures celebrating Thailand's rich cultural heritage.

Each piece tells a story of tradition, craftsmanship, and artistic excellence passed down through generations.

type3-project-2.name: Memorial Statue
type3-project-2.description:
A dignified memorial sculpture honoring important figures and events.

Crafted with reverence and attention to historical accuracy.

type3-project-3.name: Entrance Guardian
type3-project-3.description:
Imposing guardian figures designed for grand entrances and ceremonial gates.

These pieces combine traditional symbolism with impressive scale.

type3-project-4.name: Sacred Art
type3-project-4.description:
Religious artwork created for places of worship around the world.

Each piece is crafted with deep respect for spiritual traditions and artistic excellence.
